titles.title: MP332 In Him We Live And Move

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make a joyful noise,
Sing unto the Lord,
Tell Him of your love,
Dance before Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Make a joyful noise,
Sing unto the Lord,
Tell Him of your love:
Hallelujah!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In him we live and move
And have our being,
In Him we live and move
And have our being.
